about_the_game:
BASILISK! is a dystopian sci-fi movement shooter where you move or you die, and your style meter doubles as your health bar. Parkour, hack, slash, and shoot your way to the center of Complex One, and unplug mankind's new AI overlord, the BASILISK, once and for all.

  • Move or Die
    Your health depletes if you don't move fast enough! So stay mobile and aggressive.

  • Style is Substance
    The only way to gain health is by doing stylish actions! The more of a combo you rack up, and the more varied your playstyle, the more style/health you get!

  • Climb the Complex
    In BASILISK, almost every surface is climbable. Dash, wallrun, and mantle at ludicrous speeds, out-maneuver your enemies, and soar through levels faster than the eye can see!

  • Mod Your Bod
    Transcend the flesh and augment yourself with overpowered abilities like bullet time, or an integrated jetpack! Weapons and augments can be found by searching through levels or completing secret objectives, and can be upgraded by spending Credits.

  • Every Robot is Personalized
    Face robots of all shapes and sizes, each requiring specific movement/tactics to defeat!

Join the Discord at:

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: High Sierra 10.13+
  • Processor: Apple Silicon, x64 architecture with SSE2.
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Metal capable Intel and AMD GPUs.
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

name: BASILISK

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or Higher
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
